TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ModelProperty extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 上的属性。

span.span: A represents a property on a .

summary.span: 模型属性与项的实例关联，从而允许它们具有简单的 Value get/set 属性，而不是使用 比较麻烦的 GetValue/SetValue 机制。

span.span: Model properties are associated with an instance of an item, which allows them to have simple Value get/set properties instead of using the more cumbersome GetValue/SetValue mechanism of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的值可能来自本地设置的值，或可能继承自元素层次结构中的某个较高位置。The value of a may come from a locally set value, or it may be inherited from somewhere higher up in the element hierarchy. 使用 所返回值的 属性来确定属性值的源。Use the property of the value returned by to determine the source of the property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基础类型转换器均已包装，以便接受 对象。Underlying type converters are all wrapped so they accept objects. 在执行转换为特定值的操作时，不会包装类型转换器的返回类型。When performing a conversion to a particular value, the type converter’s return type is not wrapped. 返回标准值的类型转换器也以 对象的形式返回值。Type converters that return standard values also return values as objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `value` 不是 ，则它包装在返回到调用方的 中。If `value` is not a , it is wrapped in a , which is returned to the caller. 可设置`value`到`null`，在这种情况下将`null`。It is valid to set `value` to `null`, in which case will be `null`. 这一点与调用 不同。This is different from calling . > [!NOTE] > 使用此方法，值将不会对设置基础属性的编辑上下文完成之前。Using this method, the value will not be set on the underlying property until the editing context completes. 若要立即更新基础属性，使用。To update the underlying property immediately, use .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可能会返回一个值，进一步继承的向上元素层次结构，在这种情况下此属性将返回一个值其不`this`。A property may return a value that is inherited further up the element hierarchy, in which case this property will return a value whose is not `this`. 如果从未为该属性设置任何值时将返回`null`。If no value has ever been set for the property will return `null`.
